title: Why did touch-drag editing of calendar events stop working on Pixel2?
content:
I used to be able to touch-hold-drag events in my Google calendar app to move events to different dates/times. 

About two months ago this feature mysteriously stopped working. I just finished a long diagnostic session with Google Support and they concluded that this feature is not supported in the standard Google calendar app on my Pixel (Pixel 2, Android 9 Build PQ3A.190705.001, Google Calendar App version 6.0.42).

 My colleague uses a Pixel-3 and this event-drag feature still works fine on their phone.

I used this feature ALL THE TIME. it was so useful... are others noticing that it is no longer supported on Pixel-2?
